sentence: Physicians Formula Holdings, Inc. ( FACE ) has announced an ex-dividend date of November 21, 2012 and a cash dividend payment of $0.035 per share scheduled for December 05, 2012.
Shareholders who purchased FACE stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $4.79, the dividend yield is .73%.
The previous trading day's last sale of FACE was $4.79, representing a -6.81% decrease from the 52 week high of $5.14 and a 77.41% increase over the 52 week low of $2.70.
FACE is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Colgate-Palmolive Company ( CL ).
FACE's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $.19.
Zacks Investment Research reports FACE's forecasted earnings growth in 2012 as 600%, compared to an industry average of 5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the FACE Dividend History page.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
